page.title: 11Andover Garden Centre.
page.content: Andover Garden Centre takes up a large corner site at the end of Salisbury Road. It has been open for trading for nearly ten years. It has a large range of items for sale including plants, trees, gardening equipment, paving slabs, fencing, greenhouses and sheds. Inside some of the greenhouses the air temperature is kept warm and humid for potplants etc. A new service that the Garden Centre offers is one of landscaping work. They plan and plant your garden for you. The Garden Centre is open every day of the week and is particularly busy at the weekends.
